> I did some analysis on the 7-28-03 crawl and it looks like none of the 
> 3 crawlers are finding this javascript linked page: 
> jscriptOpenWindowArg.html 
> which is coming from http://crawl08.archive.org/links/javascript.html

Aha!
Mercator is using a regexp to parse URLs from JS code.
This regexpr filters out all URLs that start with " or '
followed by any of '.', '\n', '\r',  '"', or ''' characters. 
So this relative url was filtered out by Mercator.

Good catch Judy!
 
i.
